main.name: Parimal Mehta
main.description: I am an enthusiastic developer with over a year of experience and an always learning mindset
main.bio: Born in Boston and growing up in Ahmedabad, I have gained a well-rounded education and a strong programming foundation. I am particularly fond of Java - my first language and Python for its flexibility. Besides coding, I am also a voracious reader of sci-fi, fantasy, and mystery novels.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering
education.description: I am part of the Society of Automotive Engineers(SAE) and Association of Computer Engineering Students(ACES). Through college, I have been introduced to a breadth of experiences including internships, research, online courses, and team-based competitions.
I gained a strong foundation in the sciences, mathematics, and computer science at school. I was taught Java and OOP concepts here.

courses.title: Design and Analysis of Algorithms
courses.description: Dynamic Programming, Assignment Problem, Traveling Salesman

certifications.title: Programming for the Web with JavaScript
Programming for Everybody(Getting Started with Python)

work.title: Software Engineering Co-op
work.description: The main project I am working on is redesigning the 834 file validation process(written in PL/SQL) for Member Enrollment. Besides that, I am developing an operational dashboard to display metrics from various security tools in one place. I am also using SharePoint to automate CCA's manual invoicing process. Lastly, I am developing features and testing the new Intranet and the new Provider Directory.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
